lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Galaxy defender Ty Harden has decided to quit soccer to explore philanthropic endeavors, saying he has “always loved helping people.” Harden, 23, started 24 games as a rookie last season. He was chosen in the second round of last year’s Major League Soccer SuperDraft.
